text: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Arkhan’s winged chariot moves with supernatural speed as he scours the world in search of the enchanted items that will hasten the Great Necromancer’s return.
Monstrous mounts that shatter bones with every swipe of their tails and sink scimitar-sized fangs deep into soft flesh.

A giant Undead crab, whose pincers can tear ships apart, makes an impressive and fitting mount for the earthly offspring of Manann himself.
Very large and dead, yet still exceedingly dangerous; whoever sits astride this giant crustacean must be *extremely* confident of their power.
The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.

Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.
Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

Fierce beasts that will fight to the death any who enter their territory – be they man or Dragon!

The finest Ellyrion steed, atop which Tyrion has single-handedly put verminous hordes to flight.
